name: Khaled Saber
text: Great pizza and everyone is nice. I order from here once a week and I've never had any problems with service or quality of food. To the contrary, I enjoy coming in to pick up my pizza and they always serve it exactly as I ordered. I can …More

name: Mason Shlash
text: Very disappointed! Asked for extra pepperoni and I was charged for it but unfortunately did not receive what i wanted.

name: Nick Jovanelly
text: I've been ordering a pitcher of beer here every other week for almost 10 years, some times every week.  Never really had an issue until last night.  Guy at the register pours my pitcher with a two inch head of foam.  Ok, it happens. …More

name: Ann Dolin
text: Pizza Boli's is a dive, but so fun, especially after a hard-fought soccer game. The pizza and wings are surprisingly good, probably the best around. Great place to hang out with good friends. :)

name: Javaria Qureshi
text: Pizza's are really good,specially they have halal meat options in subs and pizzas ,food is good but place is so rough as it is in sports complex ,we always do carry out in future ....one star less is just about place not food

name: Matthew P
text: Very Good Pizza and the wings are fantastic! The wings had so much meat. Great value for the price!

name: sherry sturock
text: Ordered food and 1 and 1/2 hour after expected delivery time...still no food!  Charged my husband's credit card and won't answer the phone.  Very upset and very hungry.  Already called credit card and will be reversing charges.  Never ordering from them again :(  this was our 1st and last time!

text: They deliver late, EVERY TIME. Bruh this place is 8 minutes away, somebody explain why they're a half hour late for the estimated delivery time. Ridiculous. Kick rocks. …More

text: Customer service must be improved!!!, The lady at cashier didn't even know about my online order until I was there to pick up 30 mins after placed the order and had to wait almost 45 mins to pick up a messed up foods (No pepperoni on pizza, wrong side sauces ). Such a waste of time, really disappointed!!

text: We ordered online last week. Received confirmation email... it never arrived. So dissapointing... called the store and only voice mail. The charge finally dropped from our acct.
